thread.title: Sean Hayes Shares a Fabulous Photo From the Will & Grace Revival
thread.title_full: Sean Hayes Shares a Fabulous Photo From the Will & Grace Revival

author: Caitlin Hacker
title: Sean Hayes Shares a Fabulous Photo From the Will & Grace Revival
text:
Will and Grace Reboot Instagram Photos Sean Hayes Shares a Fabulous Photo From the Will & Grace Revival February 20, 2017 A post shared by Sean Hayes (@seanhayes) on Feb 17, 2017 at 5:34pm PST 
Will & Grace fans had their ultimate dream come true in January when it was confirmed that a 10-episode revival is coming back to TV . While details about the show are pretty scarce as of now, we do know that our favorite foursome, Will Truman, Grace Adler, Jack McFarland, and Karen Walker, will be back. On Friday, Sean Hayes (Jack) shared a nostalgia-filled photo from a recent shoot for the revival. "Hanging with these beautiful people today for the #WillAndGrace photo shoot. @meganomullally #ericmccormack," he captioned the snap. While we kinda wish they would release teaser videos on par with their epic 2016 reunion , this will definitely tide us over until then. Also, all that vodka has done Karen (Megan Mullally) gooood.
